name: Spin Attack (SquishyTurtleGames)
description:
how to play: spin attack is a turn based rogue like. each time you move your weapons will rotate in a around you 90 degrees. carefully plan your movements to defeat your enemies.

made for Ludum dare 47 in 72 hours

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/spin-attack

Bug fixes after jam:

- UI scaling issue on one screen 

- bug that caused health to reset
